00010 class pos_dep_on_joints{

00016   }

00018   pos_dep_on_joints(const pos_dep_on_joints& other)
00019   { 
00020     init();
00021     do_copy(other); 
00022   }
00023 
00024   ~pos_dep_on_joints()
00025   {
00026     if(A_J_block) delete [](A_J_block);
00027     if(A_pinv_Jtrans_block) delete [](A_pinv_Jtrans_block);
00028     init();
00029   }
00030 
00031   const pos_dep_on_joints&
00032   operator=(const pos_dep_on_joints& other)
00033   {
00034     if(&other != this){
00035       do_copy(other);
00036     }
00037     return *this;
00038   }
00039 
00040   my_float_t*
00041   mutable_J_block()
00042   {
00043 //    std::cout << "Need to design a method to handle only verts or verts "
00044 //              << "and normals\n";
00045     if(A_J_block == 0){
00046       A_ncols = 3*(verts.size());
00047       A_J_block = new my_float_t[A_nrows * A_ncols];
00048     }
00049 //    std::cout << "J block size: [" << A_nrows << " x " << A_ncols << "]\n";
00050     return A_J_block;
00051   }
00052 
00053   const my_float_t*
00054   J_block() const
00055   { return A_J_block; }
00056     
00057 
00058   my_float_t*
00059   mutable_pinv_Jtrans_block()
00060   {
00061     if(A_pinv_Jtrans_block == 0){
00062       A_pinv_Jtrans_block = new my_float_t[A_nrows * 3*verts.size()];
00063     }
00064     return A_pinv_Jtrans_block;
00065   }
00066 
00067   const my_float_t*
00068   pinv_Jtrans_block() const
00069   { return A_pinv_Jtrans_block; }
00070  
00071   void
00072   set_nrows(size_t nrows_in)
00073   { A_nrows = nrows_in; }
00074 
00075   const size_t
00076   nrows() const
00077   { return A_nrows; }
00078 
00079   const size_t
00080   ncols() const
00081   { return A_ncols; }
00082 
00083   //  int ncols; -- num cols is given by 3*verts.size()
00084   std::vector< my_float_t* > verts;
00085   std::vector< my_float_t* > normals;
00086   std::vector< int > num_joints_used;
00087 
00088 private:
00089 
00090   void
00091   init()
00092   {
00093     A_nrows = 0;
00094     A_ncols = 0;
00095     A_J_block = 0;
00096     A_pinv_Jtrans_block = 0;
00097   }
00098 
00100 
00104   void
00105   do_copy(const pos_dep_on_joints& other)
00106   {
00107     A_nrows = other.A_nrows;
00108     A_ncols = other.A_ncols;
00109     verts.clear();
00110     verts = other.verts; 
00111     normals.clear();
00112     normals = other.normals;
00113     num_joints_used.clear();
00114     num_joints_used = other.num_joints_used;
00115 
00116     // Copy J block
00117     if(other.A_J_block){
00118       if(A_J_block) delete [](A_J_block);
00119       const int n = A_nrows * A_ncols;
00120       A_J_block = new my_float_t[n];
00121       std::copy(other.A_J_block, other.A_J_block + n, A_J_block);
00122     }else A_J_block = 0;
00123 
00124     // Copy pinv(J)^T block
00125     if(other.A_pinv_Jtrans_block){
00126       if(A_pinv_Jtrans_block) delete [](A_pinv_Jtrans_block);
00127       const int n = A_nrows * A_ncols;
00128       A_pinv_Jtrans_block = new my_float_t[n];
00129       std::copy(other.A_pinv_Jtrans_block, other.A_pinv_Jtrans_block + n,
00130                 A_pinv_Jtrans_block);
00131     }else A_pinv_Jtrans_block = 0;
00132   }
00133 
00134   size_t A_nrows;
00135   size_t A_ncols;
00136   my_float_t *A_J_block;
00137   my_float_t *A_pinv_Jtrans_block;
00138 
00139 };

00165   void
00166   compute_dihedrals_and_verts_J()
00167   {
00168     // compute the columns of J corresponding to surface vertex positions
00169     if(A_have_surf)
00170       compute_portion_of_J(A_verts_dep_on_joints.begin(), 
00171                            A_verts_dep_on_joints.end());
00172     if(A_have_hbond_surfs)
00173       compute_portion_of_J(A_hbond_pts_dep_on_joints.begin(), 
00174                            A_hbond_pts_dep_on_joints.end());
00175     // compute the columns of J corresponding to protein atom positions
00176     compute_portion_of_J(A_atoms_dep_on_joints.begin(), 
00177                          A_atoms_dep_on_joints.end());
00178   }
00179 
00180   void 
00181   compute_JJtranspose()
00182   {
00183     std::fill(A_JJtranspose, A_JJtranspose + A_J_nrows*A_J_nrows, 0.0);
00184     if(A_have_surf)
00185       compute_portion_of_JJtranspose(A_verts_dep_on_joints.begin(), 
00186                                      A_verts_dep_on_joints.end(), 
00187                                      A_JJtranspose);
00188     if(A_have_hbond_surfs)
00189       compute_portion_of_JJtranspose(A_hbond_pts_dep_on_joints.begin(), 
00190                                      A_hbond_pts_dep_on_joints.end(), 
00191                                      A_JJtranspose);
00192     compute_portion_of_JJtranspose(A_atoms_dep_on_joints.begin(), 
00193                                    A_atoms_dep_on_joints.end(), A_JJtranspose);
00194   }

00332   my_float_t
00333   site_atomic_rmsd(const PDBStructure &dset_prot) const
00334   {
00335     my_float_t rmsd = 0;
00336     size_t num_atoms = 0;
00337     std::map<residue_vci, bool>::const_iterator q_res_iter;
00338     q_res_iter = A_site_residues.begin();
00339     for( ; q_res_iter != A_site_residues.end(); ++q_res_iter){
00340       const residue_vci q_res = q_res_iter->first;
00341       residue_vci dset_res = dset_prot.residues_begin();
00342       bool found_res = false;
00343       for( ; dset_res < dset_prot.residues_end() && !found_res; ++dset_res){
00344         if(dset_res->number == q_res->number &&
00345            dset_res->chainID == q_res->chainID &&
00346            dset_res->icode == q_res->icode){
00347           atom_vci Q = q_res->atoms_begin;
00348           atom_vci D = dset_res->atoms_begin;
00349           for( ; Q < q_res->atoms_end && D < dset_res->atoms_end; ++Q, ++D){
00350             rmsd += dist_squared(Q->pos, D->pos);
00351             ++num_atoms; 
00352           }
00353           found_res = true;
00354         }
00355       }
00356     }
00357     
00358     if(num_atoms == 0) return my_float_max;
00359     rmsd = std::sqrt(rmsd / num_atoms);
00360     return rmsd;
00361   }

00441   void
00442   rotate_points(pos_dep_on_joints *points, const my_float_t *R,
00443                 const my_float_t *joint_center, const int joint_number)
00444   {
00445     for(size_t i = 0; i < points->num_joints_used.size(); ++i){
00446       if(points->num_joints_used[i] < joint_number + 1) continue;
00447 
00448       // Set joint center as the origin
00449       my_float_t tmp[3];
00450       std::copy(points->verts[i], points->verts[i] + 3, tmp);
00451       my_axpy(3, -1.0, joint_center, 1, tmp, 1);
00452 
00453       // rotate the point about the axis and add the joint offset
00454       std::copy(joint_center, joint_center + 3, points->verts[i]);
00455       my_gemv(3, 3, 1.0, R, 3, tmp, 1, 1.0, points->verts[i], 1);
00456     }
00457   }
00458 
00460   void
00461   init()
00462   {
00463     A_have_surf = false;
00464     A_have_hbond_surfs = false;
00465     A_fail = true;
00466     A_J_nrows = 0;
00467     A_J_ncols = 0;
00468     A_JJtranspose = 0;
00469     std::fill(A_J_cols_in_blocks, A_J_cols_in_blocks + 3, 0);
00470   }
00471

00473   bool A_have_hbond_surfs;

00481   std::map<residue_vci, pos_dep_on_joints> A_hbond_pts_dep_on_joints; 
00482   std::vector<ModelHbondSurfaces::m_surf_vci> A_mobile_caps;

00484   std::map<residue_vci, bool> A_site_residues;  
00485
